45.eng-name: The Book of Virtue, Enjoining Good Manners, and Joining of the Ties of Kinship

hadiths.text: Abu Dharr reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) commanded me thus:Whenever you prepare a broth, add water to it, and have in your mind the members of the household of your neighbours and then give them out of this with courtesy

chapter.eng-name: Advice To Treat One's Neighbor Well
